description: suyu is the continuation of the world's most popular, open-source, Nintendo Switch emulator, yuzu. It is written in C++ with portability in mind, and we're actively working on builds for Windows, Linux and Android.
Cataclysm - Dark Days Ahead. A turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
G-code generator for 3D printers (Bambu, Prusa, Voron, VzBot, RatRig, Creality, etc.)
Simple and Fast Multimedia Library
TrinityCore Open Source MMO Framework (master = 10.2.6.53877, 3.3.5 = 3.3.5a.12340, wotlk_classic = 3.4.3.53622)
OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe

Marlin is an optimized firmware for RepRap 3D printers based on the Arduino platform. Many commercial 3D printers come with Marlin installed. Check with your vendor if you need source code for your specific machine.
Hyprland's GPU-accelerated screen locking utility
Sudachi is a Nintendo Switch emulator for Android, Linux, macOS and Windows written in C++
An open source, turn-based strategy game with a high fantasy theme.
Self-hosted game stream host for Moonlight.
A fast, local neural text to speech system
Hyprland is a highly customizable dynamic tiling Wayland compositor that doesn't sacrifice on its looks.
Control WS2812B and many more types of digital RGB LEDs with an ESP8266 or ESP32 over WiFi!

An open source quadruped robot pet framework for developing Boston Dynamics-style four-legged robots that are perfect for STEM, coding & robotics education, IoT robotics applications, AI-enhanced robotics application services, research, and DIY robotics kit development.
The hyprland cursor format, library and utilities.
A free and open-source MMORPG server emulator written in C++
Diablo build for modern operating systems
fheroes2 is a recreation of Heroes of Might and Magic II game engine.
qBittorrent BitTorrent client
MAME
A Multithreaded Fork of Redis
JUCE is an open-source cross-platform C++ application framework for desktop and mobile applications, including VST, VST3, AU, AUv3, LV2 and AAX audio plug-ins.
Vulkan-based implementation of D3D9, D3D10 and D3D11 for Linux / Wine
Arduino core for the ESP32
